name: Power State Verification
description: Validates current system power source (AC vs battery) and active power scheme (performance/balanced/saver) against expected values.

parameters.name: E_ExpectedPowerSource
parameters.help: Expected power source: ac (plugged in), battery (unplugged/on battery), or any (no check).

parameters.name: E_ExpectedPowerScheme
parameters.help: Expected active power scheme category, or any (no check).

parameters.name: B_RequireBattery
parameters.help: If true, fail when battery/power-source telemetry is unavailable (e.g., desktop or missing WMI).

parameters.name: B_FailOnUnknownScheme
parameters.help: If true, fail when the active power scheme cannot be mapped to performance/balanced/saver.
